wikipedia_page.main: Jamell Anderson (born 6 July 1990) is a British professional basketball player who plays for British club Manchester Giants as a forward.He has spent the previous four seasons with the Leicester Riders where he won two BBL Championships, two BBL Cup and one BBL Trophy. Anderson also has International experience representing Great Britain throughout their age group squads through to seniors.

response: In 2017, Blanchfield played with the Townsville Heat as a short-term injury replacement for Jamell Anderson.
